text: CLOSE Rose McGowan doesn't mince words when describing the people she believes enabled Harvey Weinstein so he could get away with alleged repeated sexual misconduct. She is promoting a new book called'Brave'which includes a detailed and harrowing account of being assaulted in a hotel room by the movie producer. ( Jan. 31 ) AP Rose McGowan and Ronan Farrow met up in person Thursday in New York to talk about her book, reality show, Harvey Weinstein, Alyssa Milano and more. ( Photo : Noam Galai, Getty Images ) It's been a heady 48 hours for Rose McGowan. Friday afternoon, she announced via Twitter that she was canceling the remainder of her public appearances, referring to an argument with a transgender woman
